_description: This service subscribes to raw UWB coordinates via MQTT, transforms them using a custom library, and publishes the results

mqtt._comment_broker: MQTT broker address. Format: tcp://host:port or ssl://host:port
mqtt._comment_source: Topic pattern to subscribe to. Use # for wildcard (e.g., tags/# matches tags/0x1234)
mqtt._comment_dest: Prefix for published topics. Tag ID will be appended (e.g., processed/tags/0x1234)
mqtt._comment_qos: Quality of Service: 0 (at most once), 1 (at least once), 2 (exactly once)

_units.origin_x: mm - X location of image top-left corner in UWB frame
_units.origin_y: mm - Y location of image top-left corner in UWB frame
_units.x_flipped: boolean - True if UWB X axis opposes Image X axis
_units.y_flipped: boolean - True if UWB Y axis opposes Image Y axis

_comment_logging: Log levels: trace, debug, info, warn, error, critical, off
_comment_log_file: Set to empty string "" for console-only logging
